    \n

    \n
    See also: List of sovereign states, Lists by country, and List of international rankings
    \n

    This is a list of lists of countries and territories by various criteria. A country or territory is a geographical area, either in the sense of nation (a cultural entity) or state (a political entity).[1]\n

    \n\n

    Demographics[edit]

    \n
    See also: Demography
    \n
    Demography
    \n
